concept-wr.title: Titanium Server CPE
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server CPE (Customer Premises Equipment) provides a scaled-down Titanium Server deployment option that combines controller, storage, and compute functionality on a redundant pair of hosts.

conbody.p: In this configuration, the controller functionality is active/standby across the nodes and the compute functionality is active/active, meaning VMs can be deployed on both hosts. LVM/iSCSI is used as the Cinder volume backend. Processor bandwidth and memory is reserved for the controller function.
